title: Similarweb Platform is Getting a New Look! | Similarweb
description: Similarweb Pro is getting a new look! Check out the latest redesign of our popular tool and experience enhanced usability and functionality. Enter now!
content: HomeBlogUpdatesProduct UpdatesSimilarweb Platform is Getting a New Look! Updates Similarweb Platform is Getting a New Look! Start your free trial by Natalie Halimi 2 Min. July 8, 2014 X Facebook Linkedin Copy link Free Website Traffic Checker Discover your competitors' strengths and leverage them to achieve your own success Analyze Traffic We’re delighted to announce the brand new design of Similarweb Platform. The new Platform interface is faster, more intuitive and incorporates loads of suggestions made by valued clients. Now all of your web, mobile and app data will be easier to access and use. Here are some highlights: The old tab system has been replaced with quick navigation speed dial, divided to web and mobile. The search box has been enhanced to support both Website Analysis and App Analysis searches from the home page. We’ve also added new dashboards for our two top sections – Website Analysis and App Analysis. In this dashboard you’ll see your – recently visited and your favorite websites/apps. We’ve also added to these dashboards a dynamic feed with the hottest trending websites and trending apps, making it easier for you to stay updated with recent industry changes. Recent & Favorites On Fire We’ve added a drop down menu located in the top left side across all pages, allowing you to navigate through the different sections of the platform from any page: The ‘Account Settings’ and ‘Support’ navigation also got a new look. We kept them in their same location as before – the top right side: We’d love to hear your feedback about the new platform interface. Contact us with comments and suggestions. by Natalie Halimi Natalie Halimi has over 10 years of marketing experience across B2C and B2B sectors.
